title: MPD searches for killer responsible for Whitehaven shooting
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
Memphis Police Department is searching for a killer who is on the loose.
Friday afternoon, police received a call about a shooting on Faronia Road at Hillcrest Apartments.
When officers arrived at the Whitehaven apartment complex, they found a man shot to death.
The person who shot him remains at large and unidentified.
If you know anything about this homicide, please contact MPD.
